title: The Man in the blue and white Holden
creator_credit: Film Victoria, Jane Karslake and Peter Luby
brief_description: A comedy with suspense about childhood fears set in the late sixties. Following the disappearance of the Beaumont children, Colin is warned about a malevolent stranger who has abducted children. Colin believes he is being shadowed by the man in a blue and white Holden. The film recalls the childhood fears drummed into children by teachers and parents, of strangers in cars. Cast includes Jeffrey Walker, Fiona Corke and Chris McLean.
